text:
The jmeter shell script does not work with GNU bash (the sh on Linux).
I'm using bash 2.05-16 on Mandrake Linux 8.2.

Also, when untarring the jmeter distribution, the *.bat files are tagged
executable, but not the *.sh files.
creator: guym@guymcarthur.com

text: The jmeter shell script has ^M (windows line feeds), preventing execution.
creator: nicolas@marchildon.net
mstover1@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9373 ***

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
